articles.author: Abby Jones
articles.title: Coldplay Announce Max Martin-Produced Album 'Moon Music' And New Sustainable Physical Formats - Stereogum
articles.content: Coldplay have enlisted Max Martin again for their upcoming 10th studio album. It’s called Moon Music, it’s out in October, and its lead single feelslikeimfallinginlove is coming this Friday. Coldplay… [+1801 chars]
